Class ServiceController.Promise

java.lang.Object
  ResultReceiver
      com.aviq.tv.android.home.service.ServiceController.Promise
Enclosing class:
ServiceController
public class ServiceController.Promise
extends ResultReceiver

Implements the asynchronous control of IntentService call

Constructor Summary

          Creates the promise object

 void every(int intervalSecs)
          Starts the intentService periodically every intervalSecs seconds

          Starts the intentService periodically every intervalSecs seconds delayed with delaySecs seconds and sets a callback handling the result when the last finishes execution

ServiceController.Promise

public ServiceController.Promise(Intent intentService,
                                 Handler handler)
Creates the promise object

Parameters:

Method Detail

then

public void then(ServiceController.OnResultReceived then)
Starts the intentService and sets a callback handling the result when the last finishes execution

Parameters:
then - the callback handling the result returned by the intentService

every

public void every(int delaySecs,
                  int intervalSecs,
                  ServiceController.OnResultReceived then)
Starts the intentService periodically every intervalSecs seconds delayed with delaySecs seconds and sets a callback handling the result when the last finishes execution

Parameters:
delaySecs - the number of seconds before starting the intentService periodically
intervalSecs - the time interval in seconds
then - the callback handling the result returned by the intentService

                  int intervalSecs)
Starts the intentService periodically every intervalSecs seconds delayed with delaySecs seconds

Parameters:
delaySecs - the number of seconds before starting the intentService periodically
intervalSecs - the time interval in seconds
